General.Name: Skandia Greenpower AS
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Skandia GreenPower AS engages in the sale of electricity to retail customers in the Norwegian market. The company also offers solar cell solutions; and smart energy solutions for solar power and energy saving, as well as solar cell panels and roofing tiles. The company is based in Kristiansand, Norway.
